skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: absentee alex pedersen
des:
Did you go to candidate forums to ask Seattle D4 candidate Alex Pedersen questions about his vague and detail-lacking policy positions?

Too bad for you that Alex was smart enough to avoid questions from the D4 voters he claims to want to represent. But now you can ask Absentee Alex Pedersen questions about his policies.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
